name: openclaw-docker-infra
description: OpenClaw AI Assistant Docker deployment with multi-provider support
author: explooosion

scripts.logs:telegram: docker logs openclaw_gateway 2>&1 | grep telegram | tail -20
scripts.rebuild: docker compose down && docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up -d
scripts.devices:list: docker exec openclaw_gateway openclaw devices list
scripts.devices:approve: docker exec openclaw_gateway openclaw devices approve
scripts.gateway:status: docker exec openclaw_gateway openclaw gateway status
scripts.skills:list: docker exec openclaw_gateway openclaw skills list
scripts.skills:install: docker exec openclaw_gateway openclaw skills install
scripts.setup:certs: mkdir -p certs && openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 365 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout certs/local-key.pem -out certs/local-cert.pem -subj '/C=TW/ST=Taiwan/L=Taipei/O=Local/OU=Dev/CN=openclaw.local' && chmod 600 certs/local-key.pem
scripts.setup:env: test -f .env || cp .env.example .env && echo 'Please edit .env file with your API keys'
scripts.setup: npm run setup:env && npm run setup:certs && npm run setup:hosts
